channel.title: Cassandra on Heartysoft Solutions Limited
channel.description: Recent content in Cassandra on Heartysoft Solutions Limited

item.title: On Cassandra
item.description: New year; renewed attempt to kickstart blogging. 2014 has been quite awesome for me. I’ve gone deeper and deeper into data – data engineering, data science, data analytics, data munging, R, Spark, Cassandra, machine learning, statistical inference… yum yum…yum yum yum. I’ve been meaning to write about these lovely adventures, but ran into perfectionist syndrome. To hell with it… I’ll put out all the imperfections coz why not? First up, Cassandra.
